#text=I had to get to work Monday , so I decided to ride the public bus since it ran fairly close to my home and work both .
#text=Monday morning I got ready early and set off to wait at the bus stop .
#text=After sitting for quite a while , the bus finally pulled up .
#text=I let others at the stop get on first , then I got on .
#text=I asked the bus driver how much the fare was and he told me .
#text=I paid the fare by sticking my money in the box near the bus driver , and walked to find a free seat .
#text=I found one near the back of the bus , and I sat down .
#text=The bus ride was fairly quick and uneventful .
#text=I noted that the ride went the same route that I did .
#text=Once the bus stopped at the stop near my work , I disembarked .
#text=That 's how I rode the public bus .
